messages.messageBody:
Thanks Joyce, I'll check that out. All my email from Yahoo Groups comes to
my outlook express.

****

For whatever it's worth, we've never been able to get outlook express to work on our computer. We've reloaded it at least once -- it will let us type a message and behave as if it actually sent the message -- but no message ever gets sent. Just the strangest thing.

Sylvia

>
> If you're bouncing repeatedly, it might be your mail program.
> Sometimes if you have too many old emails stored mail programs will
> refuse any new ones -- without telling you! If you have your program
> set to save all your sent emails, or if your trash doesn't empty
> automatically, those can be two huge storehouses of mail that are
> practically invisible.
>
> Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] ummmmmm
messages.msgSnippet: ... If you re bouncing repeatedly, it might be your mail program. Sometimes if you have too many old emails stored mail programs will refuse any new ones --
messages.messageBody:
On Mar 2, 2007, at 8:02 AM, Camden's wrote:

> If anyone figures this out let us all know. I've been bouncing for
> about a
> week & keep reactivating, and it keeps happening again & again.

If you're bouncing repeatedly, it might be your mail program.
Sometimes if you have too many old emails stored mail programs will
refuse any new ones -- without telling you! If you have your program
set to save all your sent emails, or if your trash doesn't empty
automatically, those can be two huge storehouses of mail that are
practically invisible.

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.msgSnippet: I m having a weird opposite effect - I m getting notices of bounced posts from this list and AU. At first it was just AU and I thought it was some new
messages.messageBody:
I'm having a weird "opposite" effect - I'm getting notices of bounced
posts from this list and AU. At first it was just AU and I thought it
was some new moderator thing, as it started about the same time I
started seeing the "something new for moderators" box - but now its
both, and I'm not a moderator *here*. S.T.R.A.N.G.E.

---Meredith

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] ummmmmm
messages.msgSnippet: Yahoo seems to have blips several times each year. Sometimes I ll post and only see the post show up online hours later. Also there have been times a post has
messages.messageBody:
Yahoo seems to have blips several times each year.

Sometimes I'll post and only see the post show up online hours later.
Also there have been times a post has shown up in my mail on Sunday,
but I can tell it was written on Friday!

Weird blips!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

going on? Is this happenening to anyone else? I checked my yahoo group page

but for some reason didn't make it into my box? If anyone gets this could

mail anyways LOL) so i can know if it came through. Thanks in advance, i
hope
i figure out what is going on.

~Alyssa in IL
